turns.speaker: HANOVER
turns.text: This isn't right Finnegan. I've got a contract.

turns.speaker: FINNEGAN
turns.text: 20 hours on the clock. Out and back. Double for overtime.

turns.speaker: HANOVER
turns.text: He did...with a crowbar...you know the rules on a broken contract.

turns.speaker: FINNEGAN
turns.text: I know it...but you want to get where you want to get, and back? I need a chief engineer, and unless you got a replacement, I'd highly recommend overlooking the indescretion.

turns.speaker: FINNEGAN
turns.text: Speedboat in the middle of the ocean...

turns.speaker: HANOVER
turns.text: How soon can we get up and running?

turns.speaker: FINNEGAN
turns.text: We can't...we got one engine dead, and the other limping badly.

turns.speaker: HANOVER
turns.text: We were talking about my schedule...

turns.speaker: FINNEGAN
turns.text: You're going to have to get a new one.

turns.speaker: FINNEGAN
turns.text: Great woman your mother. Real foresight.

turns.speaker: HANOVER
turns.text: And she could do a hell of a barbie to boot! Belt up. You'll find all the parts you need up there.

turns.speaker: FINNEGAN
turns.text: I assume somebody up there has made sure no distress signal can be sent.

turns.speaker: HANOVER
turns.text: I'd say that's a pretty good assumption.

turns.speaker: HANOVER
turns.text: Shut up! Shut up all of you! Now here's what we're doing... Mamooli is going to take you back to fix your engines, Chin and I are staying here to finish the job...

turns.speaker: HANOVER
turns.text: Who gives a shit about aft?

turns.speaker: HANOVER
turns.text: You trying to take over my show Finnegan, that what you trying to do?

turns.speaker: FINNEGAN
turns.text: Just trying to get to my boat...

turns.speaker: FINNEGAN
turns.text: Or maybe we're exactly where they want us to be.

turns.speaker: FINNEGAN
turns.text: It ain't any better out there!

turns.speaker: FINNEGAN
turns.text: I saved your life is what I did!

turns.speaker: FINNEGAN
turns.text: Unless you collected on the insurance...

turns.speaker: TRILLIAN
turns.text: What are you people talking about?

turns.speaker: FINNEGAN
turns.text: I was born in a City housing project in the Bronx OK? It's not in the cards that I die on a luxury cruise ship...now which way up?

turns.speaker: TRILLIAN
turns.text: Hey! Hey! Where are you going?

turns.speaker: FINNEGAN
turns.text: ...there's got to be a way to access out back there...

turns.speaker: TRILLIAN
turns.text: But what makes you think there aren't more of those...things...back there?

turns.speaker: FINNEGAN
turns.text: Nothing...you want to come, come... you don't...

turns.speaker: TRILLIAN
turns.text: You don't have to be so touchy.

turns.speaker: FINNEGAN
turns.text: Look lady, I know you people are used to getting your way...

turns.speaker: TRILLIAN
turns.text: What's that supposed to mean? You people.

turns.speaker: FINNEGAN
turns.text: Well, you sure do a good imitation.

turns.speaker: TRILLIAN
turns.text: Thank you, I work at it...

turns.speaker: TRILLIAN
turns.text: So this boat of yours...that's what you do? Give people...rides.

turns.speaker: TRILLIAN
turns.text: Since I'm a kid, I had this dream... I want to own my own tropical island... Beaches, warm ocean, lots of food, little clothes...population of one...

turns.speaker: FINNEGAN
turns.text: With the emphasis on SELF, and in selfish, right?

turns.speaker: TRILLIAN
turns.text: I don't know where it is!

turns.speaker: TRILLIAN
turns.text: Hey! I didn't have to come back.

turns.speaker: FINNEGAN
turns.text: Boat or no boat... You woulda come back anyway. You're that kind of gal.

turns.speaker: TRILLIAN
turns.text: Oh yeah? What kind is that?

turns.speaker: FINNEGAN
turns.text: I'm saying they're calling the shots...

turns.speaker: TRILLIAN
turns.text: We can't just leave them here.

turns.speaker: TRILLIAN
turns.text: So how do you get from the Bronx to the South China sea?

turns.speaker: FINNEGAN
turns.text: You quit high school, lie about your age, join the navy, and next thing you know, four years are up and you need a way to make a living...

turns.speaker: TRILLIAN
turns.text: I was so goddamn close, Finnegan! So goddamn close to my island... I could almost taste the sand...

turns.speaker: FINNEGAN
turns.text: You know what kind of force it took to rip open the bow of this ship? A million little things like this...

turns.speaker: TRILLIAN
turns.text: Oh my god! Oh my god! How do we do it? How do we get there?

turns.speaker: TRILLIAN
turns.text: ...the minute you start your engines ...it's goint to kill us, isn't it?

turns.speaker: FINNEGAN
turns.text: There's not much horsepower left in the engines, but there's enough noise...once this baby's set...I'll rev it up...that slimy bastard will come for it like candy...

turns.speaker: TRILLIAN
turns.text: If you blow up your boat, how are we going to get to the island?

turns.speaker: FINNEGAN
turns.text: Jet ski...there's one left up there.

turns.speaker: TRILLIAN
turns.text: How about noise? Can you get noise? We don't need speed, just noise, right?

turns.speaker: TRILLIAN
turns.text: You want ME to go up there?

turns.speaker: FINNEGAN
turns.text: Not unless you can wire a missle or fix an engine.

turns.speaker: TRILLIAN
turns.text: And what if I run into one of those things?

turns.speaker: FINNEGAN
turns.text: I don't mean to drop in unannounced ...you ready...

turns.speaker: TRILLIAN
turns.text: Soon as I get over the heart attack...

turns.speaker: FINNEGAN
turns.text: Three minutes...I'm not back...no matter what...you go...

turns.speaker: FINNEGAN
turns.text: You don't take orders very well, do you?

turns.speaker: TRILLIAN
turns.text: I don't take orders at all.

turns.speaker: MULLIGAN
turns.text: You ain't giving the orders here!

turns.speaker: FINNEGAN
turns.text: The hulls of these things are supposed to be impregnable...

turns.speaker: FINNEGAN
turns.text: So...If the hull's impregnable why are my feet wet?

turns.speaker: MULLIGAN
turns.text: Why don't you just stop figuring and keep working so we can get the hell out of here?

turns.speaker: MULLIGAN
turns.text: Shut up, man, just shut the hell up! I gotta think! I gotta think!!

turns.speaker: PANTUCCI
turns.text: Can we use our indoor voice please...

turns.speaker: FINNEGAN
turns.text: I'm flying blind here God damn it!

turns.speaker: FINNEGAN
turns.text: If I told you once...I told you a thousand times...

turns.speaker: PANTUCCI
turns.text: I know...I know...if the cash is there we don't care...  Finnegan this is as mean a pile of shit as we ever carried...

turns.speaker: PANTUCCI
turns.text: Here's what I think...I think these mokes below are a hit sqaud.

turns.speaker: FINNEGAN
turns.text: I saw these guy perform...at Altmont ...you know that? They opened for the Stones...

turns.speaker: PANTUCCI
turns.text: You don't give a shit about anything do you?

turns.speaker: FINNEGAN
turns.text: Sure I do...I give a shit that at 0300 hour we reach our point of dentination. I give a shit that those mojos got to do what they got to do, and 45 minutes later we are turn around and gone. I give a shit that by the time the sun comes up we are all safely tucked in bed.

turns.speaker: PANTUCCI
turns.text: That's it? That's all you give a shit about?

turns.speaker: FINNEGAN
turns.text: Oh yeah...and that my stich job doesn't make you uglier than you already are...this won't hurt a bit...

turns.speaker: PANTUCCI
turns.text: What did you do the my kids!!

turns.speaker: PANTUCCI
turns.text: No! The man in the moon!! Who's driving this thing?

turns.speaker: FINNEGAN
turns.text: I think he knows that Joey.

turns.speaker: PANTUCCI
turns.text: Good! So maybe he also know where the hell am I going to get the parts I need...

turns.speaker: PANTUCCI
turns.text: You know what I'm gonna do after this...I'm gonna get a normal life...

turns.speaker: PANTUCCI
turns.text: ...Like a house in the suburbs... maybe a couple of kids...some sort of business...be in the bowling league...go to the ball games...

turns.speaker: PANTUCCI
turns.text: What? You don't think I can have a normal life?

turns.speaker: PANTUCCI
turns.text: Finnegan, what the hell was that?

turns.speaker: FINNEGAN
turns.text: I don't know...you got what we need?

turns.speaker: PANTUCCI
turns.text: If I don't, I ain't going back to get it...you think we're safe?

turns.speaker: FINNEGAN
turns.text: Just the man I wanted to see. On this puppy here, you remember if it's red to blue or blue to red...

turns.speaker: PANTUCCI
turns.text: Not even a Joey, I'm glad to see you? Joey, what happened to your leg?

turns.speaker: FINNEGAN
turns.text: Joey, you want to get sucked out by a giant fucking mutated squid?

turns.speaker: PANTUCCI
turns.text: Red cross over to blue double blue ...is that what it is? A squid?

turns.speaker: FINNEGAN
turns.text: Squid...squid like...squid type... it's got tentacles, a feed sac... probably one central nervous processor somewhere...what the hell do I know is going on deep down in the ocean...there's all sorts of shit we've never seen...eighty foot clams...60 foot sharks...I'm just guessing...can you get me more juice out of Hercules...fast?

turns.speaker: PANTUCCI
turns.text: For juice, I gotta rebuild. That's not fast.

turns.speaker: PANTUCCI
turns.text: Can somebody tell me what the object of the exercise is here?

turns.speaker: FINNEGAN
turns.text: Seafood salad.  You ever operate a jet ski?

turns.speaker: PANTUCCI
turns.text: I've never seen you so congenial with a mamber of the opposite sex... The two of you got a nice patter going...got a nice rapport...

turns.speaker: FINNEGAN
turns.text: And you got 10 minutes before this thing livens up a boring evening.

turns.speaker: PANTUCCI
turns.text: You know what I think? I think our luck has just about run shit out...

turns.speaker: PANTUCCI
turns.text: I think we gotta stop floating from one fucked up situation to the next...

turns.speaker: FINNEGAN
turns.text: Line it up now, nice and easy...

turns.speaker: PANTUCCI
turns.text: I'm telling you, man, we got to give the future some serious thought.

turns.speaker: PANTUCCI
turns.text: And what have you come up with?

turns.speaker: FINNEGAN
turns.text: How does an island sound to you?

turns.speaker: FINNEGAN
turns.text: Second whistle you make it to the deck and get ready to jump...

turns.speaker: PANTUCCI
turns.text: All you're gonna do is get yourself killed...and for what? Some chick?

turns.speaker: FINNEGAN
turns.text: You're beautiful what you're jealous, you know that, Joey?

turns.speaker: PANTUCCI
turns.text: Was it the water in my eyes or were you guys about to...

turns.speaker: PANTUCCI
turns.text: Because it's cool, you know, I can always take a walk or something down the beach...

turns.speaker: PANTUCCI
turns.text: Or I could go for a swim...although, I gotta tell you...if I never get in the water again...

turns.speaker: HANOVER
turns.text: You tell it straight or I pull the trigger. Who are you?

turns.speaker: MULLIGAN
turns.text: You know what my goal is? Before I die I want to make love to a woman from every country on earth.

turns.speaker: VIVO
turns.text: You mean countries that are acknowledged by the UN...or like made up countires too?

turns.speaker: MULLIGAN
turns.text: What the hell does that mean?

turns.speaker: MULLIGAN
turns.text: I thought the plan was we'd evacuate them after we got through.

turns.speaker: VIVO
turns.text: Hey! You hear me? Come out!

turns.speaker: VIVO
turns.text: I'm not screwing around with you man...I hate the cold water.

turns.speaker: MULLIGAN
turns.text: Hey! What are you trying to pull!

turns.speaker: PANTUCCI
turns.text: Why don't you help us so we can get done faster so we can get the hell out of here?

turns.speaker: MULLIGAN
turns.text: 'Cause grease monkey ain't in my job description dick head...

turns.speaker: MULLIGAN
turns.text: What happened to Vivo?! What the hell happened to Vivo?

turns.speaker: PANTUCCI
turns.text: What's there to think about?? That THING back there...

turns.speaker: MULLIGAN
turns.text: There ain't no thing here!! No thing!! There's you him and me!! Got it! You him and...

turns.speaker: JOHN
turns.text: You just put mustard on your Hershey bar.

turns.speaker: JOHN
turns.text: I mean let's get going before --

turns.speaker: JOHN
turns.text: Here. Here we go.  Here's to you, Nick!

turns.speaker: ALBERT
turns.text: Hey! Fuckin' A! Just... just like a hot shit... except cold.

turns.speaker: VINCE
turns.text: What do you think, Sal? Jesus, you think we'd miss this?

turns.speaker: VINCE
turns.text: And we want you to know, Sal, that any help you might need--

turns.speaker: VINCE
turns.text: I'll get it! Where is it?

turns.speaker: VINCE
turns.text: It is too! Now you passed it!

turns.speaker: VINCE
turns.text: This is it. Definitely. This is it, but they changed it.

turns.speaker: VINCE
turns.text: I'm telling you, they changed it!

turns.speaker: VINCE
turns.text: So he's in the next one, Albert. I mean take it easy. I mean you're driving everybody nuts!

turns.speaker: VINCE
turns.text: It's gotta be the next one. I mean it's gotta be! Right, Albert?

turns.speaker: VINCE
turns.text: Where the hell were you? We were all set -- beer, broads. Right? Am I right?

turns.speaker: VINCE
turns.text: Fuckin' guy's been shooting slants, Albert! I mean, what do you think?

turns.speaker: VINCE
turns.text: What do you think? You think he's been picking flowers? Fuckin' guy's been saving your ass, Albert. Everybody's ass! Even in Europe!

turns.speaker: ALBERT
turns.text: Yeah. Oh, boy, yeah... Jes', you must be tired.

turns.speaker: VINCE
turns.text: Hey, Nick, I mean... This here is for the guy that gets caught!

turns.speaker: ALBERT
turns.text: Hey! Fuckin' A! Time to roll!!!
